item.title: Lol How To Make Npc's Talk? [317]
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“daved, post:4, topic:322995”]case (Add a new case here):
talk(“Add Text here)”, Npc id here);

Look for a npc talking and find the end of the list, see which is the last case and add that case + 1… You should do fine with this…[/quote]
Where should you put that?

Read full topic
